author: Taylor Rivers, Natasha Grzincic
title: Watch Celebrities Unravel, Live!
description: A communist plea from Britney Spears and a daily briefing from healthcare expert Cardi B are what happens when you tell spotlight-hungry stars to just... stay home.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Canada.
As we all slowly lose track of the days, our daily routines disintegrate, and we try new games like what does six cups of coffee feel like, a new warped sense of normalcy emerges. For celebrities, the lack of … [+6082 chars]
